channel.title: CVE Feed for ESTsoft -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESTsoft -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-5196|2024-09-16T18:48:27.749Z -- estsoft -- alzip
item.description: Alzip 10.76.0.0 and earlier is vulnerable to a stack overflow caused by improper bounds checking. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted LZH archive file, a attacker could execute arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-21147|2024-09-16T17:28:13.223Z -- estsoft -- alyac
item.description: An out of bounds read vulnerability exists in the malware scan functionality of ESTsoft Alyac 2.5.7.7. A specially-crafted PE file can trigger this vulnerability to cause denial of service and termination of malware scan. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
